primary:
soul, living being, life, self, person, desire, appetite,
        emotion, and passion
description: = that which breathes, the breathing substance or being

senses.description: = that which breathes, the breathing substance or being
The נפשׁ becomes a living being
The נפשׁ (without חיה noun or verb) is specified

The נפשׁ as the essential of man stands for the man himself:
    

a. paraphrase for personal pronoun especially in poetry and ornate discourse, 70 t.; (1)
        נַפְשִׁי = me:
אל תבא נפשׁי
Gen 49:6

J

Isa 43:4
peoples instead of thee; אָֽמְרוּ לְנַפְשֵׁךְ
Isa 51:23.

        (5)

Isa 46:2
they are gone into captivity; אוי לנפשׁם
Isa 3:9.
